mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lesson ORDER BY id LIMIT 12 OFFSET #{page}

SELECT lesson.id AS id ,lesson.title AS title ,lesson.teacher_id AS teacher_id ,lesson.created_at AS created_at ,lesson.terminated_at AS terminated_at ,lesson.description AS description ,lesson.price AS price FROM user INNER JOIN lesson_student ON user.id = lesson_student.student_id INNER JOIN lesson ON lesson.id = lesson_student.lesson_id WHERE user.id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC
